scripts.dev: npm run docker:compose && npm run dev:nyc_data && npm run dev:server
scripts.dev:nyc_data: npm run nyc_data:check || npm run nyc_data:load
scripts.nyc_data:check: docker exec postgres /usr/bin/psql --user postgres -c "select count(*) from nyc_subway_stations"
scripts.nyc_data:load: npm run nyc_data:download && npm run nyc_data:unzip && npm run nyc_data:restore
scripts.nyc_data:restore: cd node_modules/workshop/postgis-workshop/data/ && docker exec -i postgres usr/bin/pg_restore --dbname postgres --user postgres < nyc_data.backup
